reviewText: Great movie, not your typical western but very entertaining. ?.
Funny movie wish I could've purchased on instant video but it arrived in two days so not bad at all. Very Happy Customer
One for a western collection.  These two wonderful actors are great in there parts.  The movie is truly different and funny.

I had seen this movie on HBO years ago when it was shown though the HBO network.  It is a really funny western movie and I
enjoyed watching this movie again.  I am glad I purchased the DVD.
I think this movie is the greatest western, i'm not very much a western man, but this movie is absolutely GREAT.
Great movie!
I love this movie! Its do great to me because it has all the awesome elements of am old western, but it's hilarious.
I purchased this for my husband for Christmas. It is one of his all time favorite movies.
Love it!
I'm happy

I remember when this came on tv when I was a kid. My mom recorded it on vhs and over the years we watched it until the tape broke. Its great its on DVD and I only wish she was still here to watch it one more time.
very funny
son loved it....Christmas present
This is a great entertainment movie. I saw it when it came out on HBO and I am still quoting lines from it today--almost 25 years later.
bought this as a gift for my husband
What a great movie!!  Not a lot of sex, drug use, profanity, nudity, graphic violence, and other stuff like most of the movies coming out these days.  A very refreshing change!!
Saw this movie when i was a youngster and now watching it as an adult, just as good!!! GREAT MOVIE!!!! good mix of comedy and shootem up bang bang.
Love this movie. Amazing characters and great jokes

This is a great made for HBO movie that was really humorous.  Love a good western and this one was fun.  Lou Gossett is great in it as well as Anthony Edwards.  Many other familiar faces.  "Spoiled by spare spurs...Spoiled by spare spurs...Spoiled by spare spurs...  Say that three times fast!"
Love this movie
Very entertaining.
Good movie
A+
I loved the movie!
